thread.title: Top 10: the best design hotels in Barcelona
thread.title_full: Top 10: the best design hotels in Barcelona

author: Sally Davies
title: Top 10: the best design hotels in Barcelona
text:
Articles Top 10: the best design hotels in Barcelona Soho House Barcelona's English country house style has been magicked from nothing, yet feels as classy and worn-in as a well-loved pair of brogues Sally Davies , Destination expert 22 February 2017 • 3:56pm 
A n insider's guide to the top design hotels in Barcelona, including the best for cutting-edge interiors, rooftop pools and bars, in locations including the beach, Passeig de Gracia and Port Vell. Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain 8 Telegraph expert rating Barcelona's first design hotel. The Omm's avant-garde style and the constant transformation of its much fêted restaurants and bar has kept it cutting edge. The long lobby has a floating fireplace surrounded by cubed leather furniture, and leads into a bustling central bar area, and beyond that the restaurant, Moo, while the rooms have a crisp, fresh design. From the terrace there is a unique view of Gaudí's warrior-like chimneys on the roof of nearby La Pedrera. Read expert review From £ 186 per night
